name: Hemlane
description: Full-service property management automation for small landlords.
target_audience_match: Ideal for landlords juggling a few units who need full automation without hiring a manager.

name: DoorLoop
description: Modern, user-friendly platform with built-in AI for landlord workflows.
target_audience_match: Perfect for part-time landlords who want a sleek, intuitive tool that works out of the box.

name: RentRedi + Latchel
description: Bundle of rent management and AI-powered maintenance support.
target_audience_match: Best for DIY landlords who want maintenance off their plate without hiring full-time help.

name: TurboTenant
description: A free, lightweight solution with smart features for scaling landlords.
target_audience_match: Great for budget-conscious landlords needing automation without the software bloat.

name: Innago
description: Simple, free platform that uses smart automation to manage rent and leases.
target_audience_match: For small landlords who want essential features without a steep learning curve.
